ShipmentItem.name: ShipmentItem
ShipmentItem.description: Represents a product that’s included in a shipment.

Description.description: The description of the shipment item.

ExpectedDeliveryDate.description: Expected delivery date of the shipment that contains the shipment item.

Product2Id.description: The product associated with the shipment item.

Quantity.description: The quantity of products represented by the shipment item.

ReturnOrderLineItemId.description: The return order line item associated with the shipment item that’s part of a return shipment.

ShipmentId.description: The shipment that contains the shipment item.

ShipmentItemNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the shipment item.

TrackingNumber.description: The tracking number of the shipment that contains the shipment item.

TrackingUrl.description: The tracking URL of the shipment that contains the shipment item.
